-e ---

𐌷 ḫw CH GH < GW/KW

𐌷𐌰𐌹𐌻𐍃 heilig / healed / healthy wealthy whole well < *kóh₂ilus kall 𓎟

𐍆𐌰𐌹𐌷𐌿 faιḫu Vieh < Fiecher
𐍆𐌰𐌿𐌷𐍉 fauḫu[s] Fuchs fox

𐌲𐌰𐌽𐍉𐌷𐍃 genuḫs genug! enough (𐌷𐍃=g whichever provides it)
𐍃𐍄𐌰𐌹𐌽𐌰𐌷𐍃 staιnaḫs steinig stony,rocky
𐍃𐌻𐌰𐌷𐍃 slaḫs Schlag
𐍃𐌻𐌰𐌷𐌰𐌻𐍃 Schläger, Schlächter ( pugnacious,lout,bully )
𐍃𐌻𐌰𐌿𐌷𐍄𐍃 Schlachtung slaughter
𐍃𐍅𐌰𐌹𐌷𐍂𐌰 sweιḫra Schwieger… father-in-law
𐍅𐌰𐌹𐌷𐍃𐍄𐌰𐍃𐍄𐌰𐌹𐌽𐍃 weιḫstastaιns Weichen…stein Wegesstein
𐍅𐍂𐍉𐌷𐍃 vrōḫs Frage! accusation
𐌷𐌰𐌽𐌳𐌿𐍅𐌰𐌿𐍂𐌷𐍄𐍃 ḫanduwaurḫts handwrought handwerk(t) ⇔ Kenntnis
𐌷𐌻𐌹𐍆𐌰𐌽 klauben > klauen

Dialectic reading:
𐌰𐌽𐌳𐌷𐌿𐌻𐌾𐌰𐌽 entḫulɕen/untcvrl enthüllen++ uncover:𐌷𐌿𐌻[old reading]

However there are about just as many words in which 𐌷𐍃 is now read as "chs"!
𐍅𐌰𐌷𐍃𐍄𐌿𐍃 waḫstus Wachstum size,stature,increase,growth
𐌿𐍃𐍅𐌰𐌷𐍃𐍄𐍃 auswaḫsts Auswachsen increase,growth
𐌸𐌰𐌷𐍃𐌿𐍃 ƌaḫsus ƌaḫsus Dachs(hund) texugo, dassie Dog
𐌸𐌰𐌹𐍂𐌷𐍃𐌰𐌹𐍈𐌰𐌽 ƌaιrḫsaιwen durchsehen see through
𐌽𐌹𐌿𐌷𐍃𐌴𐌹𐌽𐍃 nιuḫseιns nachsehen visitation,inspection
𐍃𐌺𐍉𐌷𐍃𐌻 shōḫsl Scheusal? demon,ghoul

𐌰𐌿𐌷𐍃𐌰 øḫsa auḫsa Ochse ox Oger?
𐍃𐌰𐌹𐌷𐍃 saιḫs sechs six
𐍆𐌹𐌻𐌿𐍆𐌰𐌹𐌷𐍃 fιlufaιḫs vielfach vielfältig manifold, many faceted

Maybe these conflicting orthographic readings come from different times, or we are biased with the modern corrupted reading.

𐍃𐌺𐍉𐌷𐍃 schuḫs Schuh shoe Frisian: Skoch Faroese: skógvur ⲑⲱⲟⲩⲓ ⲧⲟⲟⲩⲉ կոշիկ košik

skógvur Confirms the initial observation that 𐌷𐍃=g...

R component? via 𐌰
𐍆𐌰𐌷𐌴𐌳𐍃 Freude Farḫeude/Froḫeude

N component sic 𐌷⋍𐌿 or 𐌰𐌷 ANG wegen 𐌰=AIN
𐍆𐌰𐌿𐍂𐌰𐌷𐌰𐌷 vorḫaḫ Vorhang!
𐍆𐌰𐌿𐍂𐌷𐌰𐌷 verḫaḫ Verhang ⋍ Vorhang
